duties_responsibilities.duty: Proficient knowledge of RF test equipment (Keysight, Rhode &Schwartz)
Proficient knowledge of related industry specifications and standards SCTE, ANSI, IEEE, etc.
Proficient knowledge of basic CATV devices and outside plant
Experience with S-parameters or MER required
Should be able and willing to work in a lab environment
Proficient knowledge with Amplifiers and/or line extenders
Experience with egress leakage, RFI and channel noise desired
Knowledge of ISP (Inside Plant) is a bonus
